General.Name: Zhejiang Chengchang Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Chengchang Technology Co., Ltd. engages in research, development, production, and sale of microwave and millimeter-wave analog phased array T/R chips in China. The company offers power amplifier chips, low noise amplifier chips, analog beamforming shaped chips, and passive components. Its products are used in detection, remote sensing, communication, navigation, electronic countermeasures, and other fields. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
